import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Chart } from 'chart.js'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'OurBank'; name = "Isaac Newton"; getName() { return this.name; } }
